arsmeteorites.ritual_desc.ritual_conjure:
Summons a massive meteorite from the world's inner workings.
Please consume items to select meteorites first and then consume items to expand the radius of meteorites.
Mana source is consumed according to the number of blocks generated.
tooltip.arsmeteorites.source_gem: Can be used to increase the radius of meteorites
tooltip.arsmeteorites.input: Can be used to select meteorites
tooltip.arsmeteorites.direction: Can be used to adjust the center position of the meteorite
